captions: The image depicts a pile of apples being washed in a washing machine. The apples are placed in a large container, and they are being cleaned thoroughly to remove any dirt, grit, or fungi that may be present. The apples are arranged in a way that they are in contact with each other, allowing the washing machine to effectively clean them. The apples are being washed in a batch, ensuring that they are all cleaned at the same time, and the process is likely to be repeated until all the apples are washed and sanitized.

The image shows a pile of apples, which are being washed in a washing machine. The apples are in a large container, and they are being cleaned thoroughly. The apples are arranged in various positions, some are on top of each other, and the washing machine in a way that they are rubbing against one another, which helps to remove any dirt and maintain their freshness and quality, ensuring they are ready for consumption or further processing.

The image shows a large pile of apples being washed in a machine, likely a washing machine or a fruit washer. The apples are being cleaned thoroughly, with some of them being submerged in water and others being rubbed by a brush to remove any dirt, grit, or fungi. The apples are arranged in a pile, with some on top of each other and others partially submerged in the water. The scene suggests that the apples are being prepared for consumption or further processing, ensuring they are clean and safe for consumption.

The image shows a large pile of bananas in a bowl, with some of them being washed and others still dirty. The bananas are being washed in a washing machine, which is filled with water and detergent. The bananas are being rubbed and scrubbed to remove any dirt, grit, and potential fungi. The washing process is likely being done to ensure the bananas are clean and safe to consume.

The image shows a large bowl filled with a mixture of food, possibly a dish of fruit or vegetables, being washed in a sink. The bowl is placed on a countertop, and there are several apples and oranges scattered around it. Some of the apples are placed near the edge of the sink, while others are located closer to the center of the bowl. The oranges are spread out in various positions, with some near the apples and others closer to the edge of the sink. The scene suggests that the food is being prepared for cooking or consumption, and the washing process is being carried out to clean and sanitize the ingredients.

The image shows a large pile of bananas in a bowl, with some of them being washed and others still dirty. The bananas are being washed in a sink filled with water, and a sponge is present in the scene, likely used for scrubbing the fruit. The bananas are arranged in various positions, with some lying on top of each other and others partially submerged in the water. The scene suggests that the bananas are being cleaned and prepared for consumption or further processing.

The image shows a large pile of apples in a bowl, with some of them being washed and others not yet washed. The apples are yellow and appear to be in various stages of washing. Some apples are placed on top of each other, while others are scattered around the bowl. The apples are being washed to remove dirt and any potential fungi, ensuring they are clean and ready for consumption.

The image features a large pile of bananas, some of which are yellow and others are green. They are placed in a bowl, and they appear to be covered in dirt and possibly some rotten spots. The bananas are being washed, likely to remove the dirt and any potential fungi, ensuring they are clean and safe to eat. The close-up view of the bananas in the bowl highlights their various stages of ripeness, with some appearing ripe and others still unripe.

The image features a large pot filled with water, containing a variety of potatoes, including some that are partially submerged and others floating on the surface. The potatoes are in various stages of cooking, with some appearing to be boiling and others being cooked. The pot is placed on a stove, and the potatoes are arranged in a way that they are partially covered by the water. The scene suggests that the potatoes are being cooked in a boiling pot of water, likely for a meal or a dish.

The image features a large pot filled with a mixture of food, likely potatoes, floating in a liquid. The pot is placed on a stove, and the food appears to be cooking. The pot is filled with a variety of potatoes, some of which are partially submerged in the liquid, while others are floating on top. The pot is placed on a stove, and the food is being cooked in the liquid, possibly water or oil.

The image features a close-up view of a bunch of bananas on a table. There are several bananas in the scene, with some of them being green and others yellow. They are placed on a black surface, possibly a table or a countertop. The bananas are arranged in a group, with some overlapping each other, creating a visually appealing display. The image is in black and white, which adds a classic and timeless touch to the scene.

The image features a close-up view of a black tray filled with several potatoes, some of which are yellow and some are green. The potatoes are arranged in a row, with some of them being placed on a black tray and others on a black counter. The potatoes are in various stages of ripeness, with some appearing to be ripe and ready to eat, while others are still unripe. The image captures the essence of a kitchen scene where potatoes are being prepared or stored.
